Section.name: About Miracle Educational Society Group of Institutions
Section.description:
Miracle Educational Society Group of Institutions (MES), Vizianagaram was established in 2009. MES focuses on delivering a unique technical institute for technology development in the country where active education goes hand-in-hand with technology and research.
